text: @GovRonDeSantis He fuckwit, there's this thing, called Coronavirus...do something about that. Or do you need a reminder of your obnoxious rant from 5/20 about how great you are, standing with @VP? Maybe I need to use a racial slur for you to remember? Your economy won't recover with Covid-19.
